allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add profile avatar in header, settings page, and collapsible sidebar

- Add TopBar component with profile avatar dropdown \(view profile / logout\)
- Add Settings page with profile photo upload and user info display
- Add sidebar collapse/expand with smooth 300ms transitions
- Add Light/Dark theme switcher in sidebar footer
- Add tooltips on hover for collapsed sidebar icons
- Add responsive layout: sidebar becomes bottom nav on mobile

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
